pageContext.claim: “I greatly appreciate Nancy Pelosi’s statement against impeachment, but everyone must remember the minor fact that I never did anything wrong.”
pageContext.analysis: When talking about impeachment in an interview with The Washington Post, Pelosi said Trump "wasn't worth it." She didn't say that she thought he was innocent of any crimes. Trump is still under investigation by several jurisdictions for a variety of offenses. Pelosi also said that Trump was unfit to be president.
